titles.title: To amend the Clean Air Act to prohibit the Environmental Protection Agency from promulgating a Federal Implementation Plan prior to the disapproval of State implementation plan revisions required pursuant to the Clean Air Act Amendments of 1990, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H7998)
Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: 8/12/1994--Introduced. Amends the Clean Air Act to provide that nothing in such Act shall be construed to authorize or require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to promulgate or enforce an implementation plan pursuant to any court order or settlement based upon requirements in effect prior to the enactment of the Clean Air Act Amendments of 1990 until the Administrator has disapproved State implementation plan revisions in accordance with the Clean Air Act Amendments of 1990.
